job.title: Senior Ruby on Rails Software Engineer
job.description: strongHi were NutscombrstrongWere changing the landscape of snacking on nuts dried fruit chocolate and more We planted our roots in Newark New Jersey during the Great Depression selling premium nuts on Mulberry Streets openair market Weve come quite a long way since then taking our multigenerational family business online in 1999 Even after 90 years we continue to pride ourselves in expertly sourcing the highest quality foods and treating our customers like familybrbrWhats our team like Were driven collaborative and entrepreneurial Energy and passion power our business and we look for candidates who share in that excitement to help us continue to build something specialbrbrstrongThe rolebrstrongCome help implement and deploy new features for the Nutscom warehouse operations software You will have the opportunity to make immediate contributions to our Ruby on Rails warehouse management system interact with the end users of your features and see the direct impact they have in supporting Nutscoms rapid growthbrbrThis software drives dozens of foodsafety sourcing production and fulfillment processes for facilities across the country Youll work on a small team with a modern codebase building topoftheline software in a domain that rarely sees innovation like this Our team has built this system from the ground up with a keen focus on producing clean and maintainable code We describe ourselves as pragmatic perfectionists always striving to produce the highest quality code while delivering new features that are absolutely critical to supporting the demanding growth of our businessbrbrRuby on Rails experience is key ideally in a large codebase with a focus on longterm maintainability and stability Understanding the fundamentals of good data modeling and SQL queries is important AWS and Docker experience is a plusbrbrstronguWhat Youll Bringbrustrongul listrong5 years of professional software development experiencestrongli listrongSubstantial experience with Ruby on Railsstrongli liA track record of designing clean maintainable and well tested codeli liSQL expertiseli liExperience developing deploying and supporting missioncritical web applicationsli liWillingness to communicate directly with operators using our software in the warehouse environmentli liWillingness to improve and enforce development and Agile delivery best practicesli liHandson experience with AWS tools and services is a plusli liThe ability to work independently but also to collaborate with your peers in tech and other disciplines as neededli liBS in Computer Scienceli brbrulstronguWhat We Offerbrustrongul liA challenging role in a rapidly evolving businessli liCompetitive compensation benefits and 401K Matchli liPaid Maternity Adoption and Paternity leaveli liAnd all the Nutscom snacks your heart desires  a 40 employee discountli brulstrongEEO STATEMENTbrbrstrongNutscom is an affirmative action and equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity gender expression national origin age protected veteran or disabled status or genetic information
